name: Hyper Skitzer Space Run
description: Blast off through space at hyper speed collecting cargo packages, avoiding hostile flying saucers firing at you, and dodging dangerous meteors! Witness life bearing planets decimated by comets, then test your reflexes as a captain to dodge the oncoming destroyed planet debris! If you're skilled enough to make it to the end of the level, face off with deadly space pirates head to head! Dodge, dip, duck, and blast your way though space!
